aboutme.title: About me
myinfo: I am 24 years old and am currently studying M.Sc. IT-Security at the Technical University Darmstadt.
Computer science and computers generally have been my passion for a long time and I learned a lot about
the various fields of computer science in my during by bachelor in computer science. During this time,
I developed a stark interest in software development and IT-Security.
Regarding security, especially the technical topics web- and network security, and cryptography as well as,
the topic Information security management have really peaked my interest.
With great enthusiasm in learning new things and my interest in security as wells as development, I want to
help make IT systems more secure.

general.title: General
content: In 2017 I started my bachelors degree with great amount of fascination in software development

and Cybersecurity at the TU Darmstadt.

Since then I have gained many skills and much
knowledge in the various disciplines of computer science through my studies but also through
personal and university projects. Especially through those project, I have gained much knowledge

and a variety of programming languages and frameworks.

In my free time I also like to
indulge in solving tasks in CTFs or Hack-the-box und am continuously keeping me up to date.

bachelor.title: TU Darmstadt

Elective Subjects: RoboticsIT-SecurityWeb-, Knowledge- and Information Processing
Topic of my thesis: Creating a cybersecurity web corpus

trutzbox.title: Comidio GmbH
trutzbox.description: Frontend developer for the TrutzBox's admin interface. My job was to take the old admin interface and rewrite it in ReactJS with a modern UI

c++.title: TU Darmstadt - C/C++ practical programming course
c++.description: In a team we created new exercises to teach student how to write C/C++ code correctly and cleanly.

psaf.title: TU Darmstadt - Project seminar autonomous driving
psaf.description: As a student assistant my main task was to be a contact for the students, and to maintain the used cars and further develop custom made software. Automation, debugging, bugfixing, and writing documentation was also part of my job.

master.title: TU Darmstadt
master.description: My current studies. In this degree I will learn a lot about information security systems, technical system- and software security, and modern cryptography.
